name: SpaceMan (itch) (FailSafeWasTaken)
description:
In SpaceMan you play as a super-soldier sent into space to take care of a bunch of cybernetically-enhanced mercenaries, who’ve taken over a Space Colony that was researching and developing new technologies. You know nothing about these technologies, but you do know you have to kill everything on board. Scorched Earth.

Accompanied by only your AI-Buddy: FailSafe, who’s a bit more inquisitive about the situation and wants you to scan your surroundings to learn more about these augmented mercenaries.

This journey is bound to be a gruesome one. But maybe you’ll learn more than your contractors wanted you to, along the way. (Or you would if the game was complete)

This project was made by a group of five for exams over a period of about 3-4 months, we hope you'll enjoy what's there.

Music credits inside the .rar.
